head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FINKEL, SYDNEY NATHANIEL

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FINKEL, SYDNEY NATHANIEL

block.p: FINKEL-Sydney Nathaniel, of Verona, NJ. Beloved husband of Janice (nee Unger). Devoted father of Nancy Finkel Coleman, Amy Finkel Gleicher, John David Finkel and the late Virginia Lee Finkel. Loving grandfather of Benjamin Max Lee Coleman, Molly Virginia Coleman, Jonathan Norman Gleicher, Adam David Gleicher, Max Frederick Gleicher, Maggie Sarah Finkel, Sam Nathaniel Finkel and Isaac James Finkel. Services Bernheim-Apter-Goldsticker Suburban Funeral Chapel, 1600 Springfield Ave., Maplewood, NJ, Friday, 11:30 AM.

FINKEL-Sydney Nathaniel, of Verona, NJ. Beloved husband of Janice (nee Unger). Devoted father of Nancy Finkel Coleman, Amy Finkel Gleicher, John David Finkel and the late Virginia Lee Finkel. Services Bernheim-Apter-Goldsticker Suburban Funeral Chapel, 1600 Springfield Ave., Maplewood, NJ, Friday, 11:30 AM.
